com.phunware.location_core

Interface PwLocationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PwAbstractLocationProvider, PwManagedLocationProvider

    public interface PwLocationProvider
    Defines the methods used to create a location provider.

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether location services are enabled on the device.
        Returns:
        true when location provider is available, false otherwise.

      • getSettingIntentAction

        String getSettingIntentAction()
        Returns a string value of intent action, when isAvailable() is false, can use this to open appropriate setting dialog.
        Returns:
        null if isAvailable is true, otherwise intent action string

      • requestLocationUpdates

        void requestLocationUpdates(PwLocationListener pwLocationListener)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Starts the generation of updates that report the user's current location.
        Parameters:
        pwLocationListener - the listener listens location updates event
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when pwLocationListener is null

      • removeLocationUpdates

        void removeLocationUpdates(PwLocationListener pwLocationListener)
        Stops the generation of location updates.
        Parameters:
        pwLocationListener -

      • locationProviderName

        String locationProviderName()
        Location provider name
        Returns:
        A string of location provider

      • getFirstUpdateTime

        long getFirstUpdateTime()
